in a way that involves thinking about something or someone, or doing something, too much or all the time: I was exercising obsessively but I was hardly eating and my body just couldn't cope. I turned into supermum, obsessively involved in every last detail of my young son's life. See

But the company has been obsessively secretive. They exercise for hours, devise rigid rituals surrounding food, obsessively monitor their weight and yearn to resemble the taut-bodied celebrities whose images grace magazine covers.
